page.title: 19Hobbies and Interests ii
page.content: {Fashion} Young people seem increasingly interested in fashion.Older people tend to buy clothes that last longer and are more comfortable. The most popular clothes are those in bright colours or pastel shades. Mid calf length skirts are the fashion for girls. Boys wear T-shirts, white trousers and boots or shoes. Most girls shoes are flat and brightly coloured. {Computers} Not all children are solely interested in {Pop} or {Fashion}, many are interested in computers and computer games. When they are not watching television many, play adventure games on their home computers. {Space Invaders} and other similar games are very popular,whether played on a computer or on a pocket game.
